choices.C: All compute network traffic will egress through the cloud provider Internet gateway.
choices.B: All compute network traffic destined for the data center will egress through the VPN but all Internet traffic will egress through the cloud provider Internet gateway.
choices.A: All compute and management traffic will egress to the data center.
choices.D: All compute network traffic will egress to the data center.

Tanzu Kubernetes Grid extensions, also known as Tanzu packaged services, offer additional functionalities on top of the core Kubernetes cluster. These extensions include services for authentication, ingress control, logging, service discovery, and more.
D. Tanzu Kubernetes Grid Extensions (Shared Services) are services that run in a Tanzu Kubernetes Grid instance, providing authentication, ingress, logging, and service discovery.
A definitely provides auth, so will say A

comments.content: Tanzu Kubernetes Grid also includes signed and supported versions of open-source applications to provide the container registry, networking, monitoring, authentication, ingress control, logging, and service discovery that a production Kubernetes environment requires.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Tanzu Kubernetes Grid Extensions (Shared Services) includes binaries for tools that provide in-cluster and shared services. All the provided binaries and container images are built and signed by VMware.

Selected Answer: A

Tanzu Kubernetes Grid extensions, refers to optional add-ons that can be installed on top of TKG to provide additional functionalities or integrations. It is not the primary component responsible for authentication, ingress, logging, or service discovery

questions.question_text: Which Tanzu Kubernetes Grid component provides authentication, ingress, logging and service discovery?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
VMware vRealize Log Insight Cloud (B): This solution excels in log management and security information and event management (SIEM). It allows the security team to:

Query and audit events: Collect and analyze logs from the NSX firewall and other sources for security investigations.
Provide custom real-time alerts: Create alerts based on specific security events identified in the logs, enabling swift response to potential threats.
Therefore, vRealize Log Insight Cloud aligns best with the administrator's requirement for comprehensive security event monitoring and real-time alerting for the NSX firewall.

Selected Answer: B
VMware vRealize Log Insight Cloud is specifically designed for log management and provides capabilities for querying, auditing, and setting up custom real-time alerts based on log data. It integrates well with VMware NSX and other components, allowing the security team to effectively monitor and manage security events.

Selected Answer: C
AI said: VMware vRealize Network Insight Cloud is a comprehensive network visibility and analytics solution that provides visibility into the virtual and physical network infrastructure, including VMware NSX environments. It offers capabilities for querying and auditing events, as well as creating custom real-time alerts to monitor network activity and security events.

questions.question_text:
A cloud administrator needs to provide the security team with the ability to query and audit events and provide custom real-time alerts for the VMware NSX firewall running in VMware Cloud on AWS.
Which solution would the administrator use to accomplish this goal?

A customer identifies consumption-based ransomware protection as a primary business requirement.
Which VMware solution offers long-term immutable point-in-time recovery options?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
VMware Cloud Disaster Recovery offers several features that address the customer's needs:

Consumption-based pricing: Aligns with the customer's preference for a consumption-based model for ransomware protection.
Long-term, immutable recovery points: Stores snapshots in a secure, offsite location, ensuring data integrity for long-term recovery in case of ransomware attacks.
Air-gapped storage: Recovery points are isolated from the production environment, further mitigating the risk of ransomware affecting backups.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct.
https://www.vmware.com/content/dam/digitalmarketing/vmware/en/pdf/docs/vmw-solution-overview-vmware-ransomware-recovery.pdf
